com.plexus.sam.audio
Class SimplePlaylist

java.lang.Object
  com.plexus.sam.audio.SimplePlaylist
All Implemented Interfaces:
Playlist
public class SimplePlaylist
extends java.lang.Object
implements Playlist

A simple implementation of a playlist which is simply a list of songs that can be traversed in both directions

Author:
plexus

Field Detail

songs

private java.util.List songs
The songs in the playlist

listeners

private java.beans.PropertyChangeSupport listeners
We need listener support for interacting with the gui

cursor

private int cursor
Cursor pointing to the currently playing song. The cursor ranges from -1 to songs.size()+1 It points to the currently playing song, but can also be before the first or after the last song.

Previous returns the song before the cursor next returns the song after the cursor

name

private java.lang.String name
The name of the playlist

DEBUG

private boolean DEBUG
En/disable debugging
